text: This if fine by me. Martin covers all the points I was going to say. Pass on over the good questions. :)
I'm going to say that this depends on how specific it is.  At the least, it should be community wiki.  If it isn't specific enough, then it should be closed.
Yes, why not. There's no reason why we shouldn't opt-in. If Android likes to be cool, why its Enthusiasts can't. Go for it without turning back...
I am undecided. This are two different things, although there are  very few  questions. I would let them separated for a while and see how things go.
In going back through the unanswered questions, the following twelve seemed to be more likely to garner a response or interest from average user types.
